preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from cvterm where cvterm_id = 1121;

changeSet.comment: file datatype cleanup: delete filename phenotypes, convert file scales to character and delete file datatype
changeSet.sql: # delete filename rows from phenotype delete from phenotype where phenotype_id in ( select T.phenotype_id from ( select p.phenotype_id from phenotype p inner join cvterm variable on p.observable_id = variable.cvterm_id inner join cvterm_relationship cvtrscale ON variable.cvterm_id = cvtrscale.subject_id and cvtrscale.type_id = 1220 # has scale inner join cvterm scale on cvtrscale.object_id = scale.cvterm_id inner join cvterm_relationship cvtrdatatype on scale.cvterm_id = cvtrdatatype.subject_id and cvtrdatatype.type_id = 1105 # has type and cvtrdatatype.object_id = 1121 # file data type ) T ); # migrate existing file scales to character update cvterm_relationship cr set cr.object_id = 1120 # Character where cr.cvterm_relationship_id in ( select T.cvterm_relationship_id from ( select cr1.cvterm_relationship_id from cvterm_relationship cr1 where cr1.type_id = 1105 # has type and cr1.object_id = 1121 # file data type ) T ); # Delete file data type delete from cvterm where cvterm_id = 1121;
